flawed_nl_solution:
Dana has 15 more pencils than Jayden who has 20, so Dana has 20+15 = <<20+15=37>>37 pencils
Jayden has 20 pencils which is twice as much as Marcus's so Marcus has 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 pencils
Dana has 37-10 = <<37-10=27>>27 more pencils than Marcus
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 37. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
